1370: Snelgerus was born in Koe straet in 1370.
Got married to Rycaldis at age 25 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Rycaldis, Snelgerus, at age 26.
1373: Had a daughter with Rycaldis, Emmelina, at age 28.
1374: Lost son Snelgerus when Snelgerus was 4 years old.
Lost daughter Emmelina when Emmelina was 2 years old.
1378: Had a son with Rycaldis, Vroeden, at age 33.
1380: Had a son with Rycaldis, Hatebrandus, at age 35.
1382: Had a daughter with Rycaldis, Oda, at age 37.
1387: Lost son Hatebrandus when Hatebrandus was 8 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Lost daughter Oda when Oda was 6 years old.
